page.title: 11THE PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content: The parish council consists of 13 people who look after the village.You have to be 18 to join.They meet on the 1st Monday of every month.They have elections every 4 years.The council has no real power.It tries to provide{ amenities that will benefit the village and its people.They want a cycle track for children at the comprehensive school to use instead of a dangerous road. They are discussing it with the county council who say it will cost too much. The track may not be built.The council hope to build a new play area in the village.The county council have to approve this too.As well as this the council have to make sure roads and footpaths are safe for people to use and that the village stays clean and tidy.
